testcase.name: Verify the signup to upskill elearning
testcase.system-out: Given Open the upskill elearning website....................................skipped Given user should be on the main page.......................................skipped When User clicks on SignUp link.............................................skipped And Select Teach Course Radio button........................................skipped And Enter mandatory details firstname "asbaag", lastname "saha", e-mail "praksaha@in.ibm.com", Username "asbaag", pass "Etihad@2021",Confirm password.skipped And clicks on Register button...............................................skipped Then Confirmation message will be populated in next screen and should have firstname "asbaag" and lastname "saha".skipped When User clicks on top right corner........................................skipped Then Validate the email "praksaha@in.ibm.com"...............................skipped When User navigates to Homepage.............................................skipped And clicks on Compose.......................................................skipped And Enter Send To "sneha"...................................................skipped And Enter Subject...........................................................skipped And Enter mail body.........................................................skipped And Click on Send message...................................................skipped Then Validate the acknowledgement...........................................skipped
